name: part_001
file: tmp_【#大空スバル３周年】おまたせ！今日はたのしんでってな～！！！！：SUBARU 3rd anniversary Live【ホロライブ】 [mhvHZpK-9Ss]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Oozora Subaru continues her performance of 'High Touch Memory'.
Intermission between songs. The stage goes dark with a visual transition.
Oozora Subaru performs 'Tada Kimi ni Hare' by n-buna.

subtitles.original: その度に
subtitles.english: Each time,

subtitles.original: 繋がっていく心
subtitles.english: Our hearts connect more and more

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないことを
subtitles.english: That I'm not alone

subtitles.original: 気付かせてくれたよね
subtitles.english: You made me realize that, didn't you?

subtitles.original: ハイタッチ 手と手叩いて
subtitles.english: High touch, hands clapping together

subtitles.original: 奏でるそのメロディが
subtitles.english: That melody we play

subtitles.original: 世界に届くまで
subtitles.english: Until it reaches the world

subtitles.original: この夢は続いていく
subtitles.english: This dream will continue on

subtitles.original: 君となら HAPPY LUCKY LIFE!
subtitles.english: With you, it's a HAPPY LUCKY LIFE!

subtitles.original: ちわーす！ このライブに来てくれたスバ友！
subtitles.english: Chiwassu! Subatomo who came to this live!

subtitles.original: 今日はいっぱい楽しんでってなー！
subtitles.english: Please enjoy yourselves to the fullest today!

subtitles.original: まだまだ盛り上がっていくぞー！
subtitles.english: We're gonna keep on getting pumped!

subtitles.original: 挫けて歩けない日は おんぶしてあげる君を
subtitles.english:
On days you're discouraged and can't walk,
I'll give you a piggyback ride

subtitles.original: ほら見てそっちの方が 強く地面踏み込める
subtitles.english:
Look, that way you can step on the ground
even more strongly

subtitles.original: 巡り巡る日々を 辿り夢見たステージへ
subtitles.english:
Through the cycling days,
to the stage I dreamed of

subtitles.original: 届くそんな日を 見つめて
subtitles.english: Gazing at the day it finally reaches

subtitles.original: 起こそう君とだけ
subtitles.english: Let's make it happen, only with you

subtitles.original: 手と手を鳴らすたび 小さなビッグバン
subtitles.english:
Every time our hands make a sound,
a small big bang

subtitles.original: 無限のその力を 受け取って進め！
subtitles.english: Receive that infinite power and move forward!

subtitles.original: ハイタッチ 手叩いて 奏でるメロディーを
subtitles.english: High touch, clap your hands, the melody we play

subtitles.original: 合図に走り出せ
subtitles.english: Start running at the signal

subtitles.original: Go! 君となら怖くない
subtitles.english: Go! With you, I'm not afraid

subtitles.original: ハイタッチ 手と手叩いて
subtitles.english: High touch, hands clapping together

subtitles.original: 重なるそのメモリーは
subtitles.english: Those overlapping memories

subtitles.original: 明日へのエネルギー
subtitles.english: Are energy for tomorrow

subtitles.original: さあ行こうよ もっと先へ
subtitles.english: Come on, let's go even further

subtitles.original: 君となら HAPPY LUCKY LIFE!
subtitles.english: With you, it's a HAPPY LUCKY LIFE!

subtitles.original: 夜に浮かんでいた 海月のような月が爆ぜた
subtitles.english: The moon, floating in the night like a jellyfish, exploded

subtitles.original: バス停の背を覗けば あの夏の君が頭にいる
subtitles.english:
Peering behind the bus stop,
you from that summer are in my head

subtitles.original:
ただ君に晴れ
作詞・作曲：n-buna
subtitles.english:
Tada Kimi ni Hare
Lyrics & Composition: n-buna

subtitles.original: 鳥居 乾いた雲 夏の匂いが頬を撫でる
subtitles.english:
Torii gates, dry clouds,
the scent of summer brushes against my cheek

subtitles.original: 大人になるまで ほら、背伸びしたままで
subtitles.english: Until I become an adult, look, I'm still standing on tiptoe

subtitles.original: 遊び疲れたら バス停の裏で空でも見よう
subtitles.english:
When we're tired of playing,
let's look at the sky behind the bus stop

subtitles.original: 時期に夏が暮れても きっときっと覚えてるから
subtitles.english:
Even if summer ends soon,
I'm sure, I'm sure I'll remember

subtitles.original: 追いつけないまま大人になって 君のポケットに夜が咲く
subtitles.english:
Becoming an adult without being able to catch up,
night blooms in your pocket

subtitles.original: 口に出せないなら僕は一人だ それでいいからもう諦めている
subtitles.english:
If I can't say it out loud, I'm alone.
That's fine, so I've already given up

subtitles.original: 夏日 乾いた雲 山桜、錆びた標識
subtitles.english:
Summer days, dry clouds,
wild cherry blossoms, a rusted sign

subtitles.original: 記憶の中はいつも 夏の匂いがする
subtitles.english: Inside my memories, it always smells like summer

subtitles.original: 写真なんて紙切れだ 思い出なんてただのゴミだ
subtitles.english:
Photos are just scraps of paper.
Memories are just trash

subtitles.original: それがわからないから 口を噤んだまま
subtitles.english:
Because I don't understand that,
I keep my mouth shut

subtitles.original: 絶えず君の憩（いこ）い、記憶に夏野の石一つ
subtitles.english:
Endlessly your rest,
a single stone of the summer fields in memory

subtitles.original: 俯いたまま大人になって 追いつけないただ君に晴れ
subtitles.english:
Becoming an adult with my head down,
I can't catch up, just clear skies for you

subtitles.original: 口に出せないまま坂を登った 僕らの影に夜が咲いていく
subtitles.english:
Climbing the hill without saying a word,
night blooms in our shadows

subtitles.original: 俯いたまま大人になった 君が思うまま手を叩け
subtitles.english:
I became an adult with my head down.
Clap your hands as you please

subtitles.original: 陽の落ちる坂道を登って 僕らの影は
subtitles.english: Climbing the hill as the sun sets, our shadows are...

subtitles.original: ああ、追いつけないまま
subtitles.english: Ah, still unable to catch up...
